code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-01.01 — Resonance Calculation State (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> VALIDATE_INPUTS : ResonanceRequested (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
note right of VALIDATE_INPUTS
  Validate schema, source, and integrity
  Inputs: contribution vector, alignment signal
end note

VALIDATE_INPUTS --> CALCULATE_RESONANCE : InputValidated
note right of CALCULATE_RESONANCE
  Compute R = I × A × e^(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
  Store temporary result and metadata
end note

CALCULATE_RESONANCE --> UPDATE_METRICS : ResonanceUpdated (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
note right of UPDATE_METRICS
  Emit resonance sample to Metrics (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  Forward weighted output to SRI Engine
end note

CALCULATE_RESONANCE --> ANOMALY_CHECK : compute anomalyScore(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
note right of ANOMALY_CHECK
  Detect abnormal patterns or oscillations
  Trigger alerts if deviation > σ threshold
end note

ANOMALY_CHECK --> FLAG_ANOMALY : AnomalyDetected (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
ANOMALY_CHECK --> UPDATE_METRICS : NormalSignal

FLAG_ANOMALY --> REVIEW : Escalate to Governance / Ethics
note right of REVIEW
  Feed anomaly context to Ethics (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  and Governance (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) for oversight
end note

UPDATE_METRICS --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] : MetricsPublished
REVIEW --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] : CaseClosed

%% =========== Styling ===========
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class VALIDATE_INPUTS,CALCULATE_RESONANCE,ANOMALY_CHECK,UPDATE_METRICS,FLAG_ANOMALY,REVIEW core;

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 和 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream'。
